biography: Jonas, a familiar name at Vantaan Golfpuisto, is known for his strategic mind and calculated approach to the game. While outwardly calm, Jonas possesses a fiery competitive spirit that ignites on the course.

Having participated in the Hector Trophée on two occasions, Jonas has demonstrated a consistent level of play. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his presence has always been felt, and he has always been a respected member of the field.

While Jonas is considered as retired from upcoming Hector Trophée events, the world of golf knows that anything can happen, and it is not impossible that Jonas once again decides to test his mettle against the best players in the game.
